languages.text: "Мне не хочется терять свое имя, как потерял его наставник. Но ткачи более никогда не произнесут его вновь, ибо я — их Висирь. Но ты — мо{mf|й|я} Домин. А я — твоя тень. Пусть хотя бы для тебя я останусь Кибеллой".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что хотела бы потерять свое имя, как потерял его мой наставник. Но ткачи Кровавой паутины более никогда не произнесут его вновь, ибо я их Висирь. Но ты — мо{mf|й|я} Эним. А я — твоя тень. Пусть хотя бы для тебя я останусь просто Кибеллой".

languages.text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."
languages.original_text: "Мне не хочется терять свое имя, как потерял его наставник. Но ткачи более никогда не произнесут его вновь, ибо я — их Висирь. Но ты — мо{mf|й|я} Домин. А я — твоя тень. Пусть хотя бы для тебя я останусь Кибеллой".

traits.locale_text: "I do not want to lose my name like my mentor lost his. But no weaver will ever say it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Enim. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah at least for you."

"I do not want to lose my name like my mentor lost his. But no weaver will ever say it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Enim. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah at least for you."

"I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

"I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

"I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

"I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

languages.text: « Je ne perdrai pas mon nom comme mon mentor l'a fait. Certes, aucun tisseur ne le prononcera plus jamais, car je suis désormais leur vizir. Mais vous, vous restez {mf|mon|ma} Domin. Et moi, votre ombre. Alors, laissez-moi rester Kibellah. Si ce n'est au monde, du moins à vos yeux. »
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne perdrai pas mon nom comme mon mentor l'a fait. Certes, aucun tisseur ne le prononcera plus jamais, car je suis désormais leur vizir. Mais vous, vous restez {mf|mon|ma} Domin. Et moi, votre ombre. Alors, laissez-moi rester Kibellah. Si ce n'est au monde, du moins à vos yeux. »

languages.text: «No quiero perder mi nombre como le pasó a mi mentor. Pero pasará, pues ahora soy la Visir y el resto mis tejedores. Aun así, usted sigue siendo mi Domin, y yo su sombra. Permítame seguir siendo Kibellah, al menos para usted».
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: «No quiero perder mi nombre como le pasó a mi mentor. Pero pasará, pues ahora soy la Visir y el resto mis tejedores. Aun así, usted sigue siendo mi Domin, y yo su sombra. Permítame seguir siendo Kibellah, al menos para usted».

languages.text: 「師匠のように我も自分の名前を失いたくはない。ですが皆のヴィジールとなった今、織り手は誰もがもう我が名を口にしないでしょう。ですが、あなたは我がドミンです。そして我はあなたの影。せめてあなたの前ではキベラでいさせてください」
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: 「師匠のように我も自分の名前を失いたくはない。ですが皆のヴィジールとなった今、織り手は誰もがもう我が名を口にしないでしょう。ですが、あなたは我がドミンです。そして我はあなたの影。せめてあなたの前ではキベラでいさせてください」

languages.text: “尽管我不想像我的导师那样失去名字，但我已经成为了宿老，织网者再也不会直呼我的名字了。不过，你是我的秘者，我是你的影子。至少在你面前，让我继续当你的绮贝菈吧。”
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我不想像我的导师那样失去名字，但我已经成为了宿老，织网者再也不会直呼我的名字了。不过，你是我的秘者，我是你的影子。至少在你面前，让我继续当你的绮贝菈吧。”

languages.text: "Ich will meinen Namen nicht verlieren, wie mein Mentor den seinen verloren hat. Doch kein Weber wird ihn je wieder sprechen, denn ich bin ihr Wesir. Doch Ihr seid {mf|mein|meine} Domin. Und ich bin Euer Schatten. Lasst mich wenigstens für Euch Kibellah bleiben."
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will meinen Namen nicht verlieren, wie mein Mentor den seinen verloren hat. Doch kein Weber wird ihn je wieder sprechen, denn ich bin ihr Wesir. Doch Ihr seid {mf|mein|meine} Domin. Und ich bin Euer Schatten. Lasst mich wenigstens für Euch Kibellah bleiben."

languages.text: "Yönderim gibi ben de ismimi kaybetmek istemiyorum. Ancak hiçbir dokur, bir daha bu ismi anmayacak. Çünkü artık Vezir benim. Yine de sen benim Dominimsin, ben de senin gölgenim. En azından senin için Kibellah olarak kalayım."
languages.original_text: "I do not want to lose my name as my mentor lost his. But no spinner will ever speak it again, for I am their Vizsier. Yet you are my Domin. And I am your shadow. Let me remain Kibellah to you, at the very least."
